issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.pornhub.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pornhub.com%2F) ### Comment > На главной стало мелькать это промо. Заблокировать вроде можно, но если перейти на любое видео, там в том же примерно месте снова всплывает этот gif/frame или хз что это. Генерируется эта шняга каким-то генератором псевдослучайных символов, поэтому заблокировать вручную на главной и страницах с видео не получается. comment.body:
Site does not show cookie message to me.
Please disable Safari content blockers, wait 30-60 seconds and reenable them again.

Please note you do not need the following filters:
```
EasyList
Fanboy's Social Blocking List
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
```

Сайт не показывает мне сообщение о файлах cookie.
Пожалуйста, отключите блокировщики контента Safari, подождите 30-60 секунд и снова включите их.

Обратите внимание, что вам не нужны следующие фильтры:
```
EasyList
Fanboy's Social Blocking List
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
```

issue.title: Facebook (Onion site) login / create account banner annoyance
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.49.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.facebookwkhpilnemxj7asaniu7vnjjbiltxjqhye3mhbshg7kx5tfyd.onion/kadokawataiwan/photos/a.120278361071648/122858280813656/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Browser: Tor Browser (since it is about the Onion site, so Tor Browser or Brave's Tor window is needed)
2. When I click into Facebook posts, there is a banner urging the user to log in or to create an account. It is an annoyance since:
  * There is no way to close the banner
  * Comments and image are obscured by the banner, and there is no way to see the obscured part

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![screenshot-1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103918092/5413892f-bca1-4f30-a211-b41fc0a23855)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![screenshot-2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103918092/c8c0d5a6-b3a5-4e28-9b1f-2f018148cba4)

</details>


### Privacy

comment.body:
Not reproduced.
Please try these two rules:
```
reddit.com#@#div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]):has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"]
reddit.com##div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]) > div:has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"]
```
